de.malkusch.localized

Class LocalizedIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.malkusch.localized.LocalizedIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hibernate.integrator.spi.Integrator

    public class LocalizedIntegrator
extends Object
implements org.hibernate.integrator.spi.Integrator
    Automatic integration into Hibernate. This is the entry point into Hibernate. Hibernate discovers this service with ServiceLoader.
    Since:
    0.2.8
    Author:
    Markus Malkusch

    • Field Detail

      • LOCALE_RESOLVER

        public static final String LOCALE_RESOLVER
        The name of a configuration setting that registers a locale resolver. Default is de.malkusch.localized.localeResolver.DefaultLocaleResolver
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setLocaleResolver

        public static void setLocaleResolver(LocaleResolver localeResolver)
        Registers a LocaleResolver. You can also configure this by the hibernate property "hibernate.listeners.localized.locale_resolver".
